story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_0200_10: Hahaha! Now no one will interrupt us!
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_0500_10:
We’re replacing you and taking control of the
Aether Foundation!
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_0700_10: We have no reason to follow you any more.
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_0800_10:
You used to research Ultra Beasts so you could
make them yours...
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_0900_10:
But now you’re fixated on family and love and
boring Pokémon conservation nonsense!
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_1000_10:
There’s absolutely no benefit to being a part of
the foundation!
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_1200_10: Branch Chief! What’s wrong with you?
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_1300_10:
That’s why we allied with Team Rocket and sold
them our Ultra Wormhole–activation technology!
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_1400_10:
We want to take over the Aether
Foundation and use the power of the
Ultra Beasts to do what we want!
story_alola_01_15000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Thanks to you, we’ve been able to exploit that
technology! Praise the Aether Foundation!
